import { useState } from "react" import { DynamicFields } from "./DynamicFields" export const EmpEduction=({empDetails,handlePop,educationDetails})=>{ const[dynamic,setDynamic]=useState(false) const fetchEducation=async(id)=>{ await axiosRequest("GET",`http://localhost:4000/api/edu/${id}`).then((res)=>{ setDetails(res) }) } return( <>
Name: {empDetails.name}
{ Array.isArray(educationDetails) && educationDetails.length!==0 ? educationDetails.map((item,i)=>{ return }) : }
ID Course Name Degree Institute Name Passout Year CGPA Actions
{item.id} {item.course} {item.degree} {item.institute} {item.cyear} {item.cgpa}
No Data
handlePop(false)}>
{ dynamic && }
) }
